name: SportZ
description:
This game is a compotation of Microgames, or short minigames, based on various sports, ranging from Baseball to American Football. This game also features Twister Microgames, where a twist is made to a sport, and Fusion Microgames, which are based on sports that are a combination of two different sports. Play for as long as you can, for if you lose at any point, you will lose the microgame.

Created and Developed by Rick Velez
